sentence: The numbers reflect the high-stakes nature of the Senate race between Warnock and his likely Republican opponent, former University of Georgia football star Herschel Walker.
author: Cami Mondeaux
title: Sen. Warnock has over $25 million in the bank for fight against GOP rival Walker

sentence: Polling averages have Georgia Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock trailing Trump-endorsed Herschel Walker in Georgia, with Hassan, Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona, and Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto of Nevada all in competitive races.
author: Christian Datoc
title: Biden thinks Democrats can gain Senate seats this year  with Trump's help

sentence: Democratic Senator Raphael Warnock of Georgia was trailing Republican challenger Herschel Walker in an Emerson College poll conducted from April 1 to 3.
author: Darragh Roche
title: Democrats' Midterm Chances Dwindling as Republicans Gain Strength: Polls

sentence: And if theyre not voting for Brian Kemp, theyre not going to be able to vote for Herschel Walker.? Per Bluestein, Kemp is fighting back, saying in a new statement, "Governor Kemp is laser-focused on uniting Republicans on May 24th to make sure Stacey Abrams is never our governor or the next president."
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Trump tells Perdue tele-rally that Republicans will bomb in Georgia if Brian Kemp is re-nominated

sentence: But that could change next year with Trump-endorsed candidates such as Herschel Walker in Georgia running in the midterm elections this November.
author: Daniel Chaitin
title: 'Long arm of Donald Trump' encircles Mitch McConnell in Senate

sentence: In a reminder of the issue's divisiveness, Biden's call for gun control on Tuesday was booed at a campaign event in Georgia hosted by Herschel Walker, a Republican running for U.S. Senate.
author: Associated Press
title: Biden Says 'We Have to Act' After Texas School Shooting

sentence: Warnock, who won in a special election in 2021, is running for a full term of his own this year against former football star Herschel Walker, and former state House Minority Leader Stacey Abrams is trying to unseat Gov.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Campaign Report  Biden confronts his most serious midterm issue
